stage_2_repository_management.conversation_reference: Comprehensive Stage 2 planning for repository management system implementation

stage_overview.content: Transform system from metadata-only to full file content storage and management, transitioning from Document to File model
stage_overview.strategic_importance: Enables true repository management similar to InvenioRDM but simplified for specific needs
stage_overview.prerequisite: Stage 0 (React infrastructure) and Stage 1 (batch editing) must be complete
stage_overview.completion_criteria: Full file ingestion, storage, and management system operational with Document→File migration complete

storage_organization.content: Files organized by collection handle, then catalog number, with automatic metadata JSON generation
storage_organization.metadata_files: Automatic generation of {collection_handle}-metadata.json and {catalog_number}-metadata.json in respective folders
storage_organization.metadata_content: JSON files contain full account of object's information for external reference

model_transition.content: File model replaces Document model with enhanced capabilities for actual file management
model_transition.relationship_preservation: Same relationship structure as Document model (primarily with Items)
model_transition.field_mapping: Document fields map to File fields, determined during development
enhanced_capabilities: Automatic connection to real files on disk
Works on public server even when files are missing (metadata-only)
model_transition.access_control: Same access level system as Items model

upload_mechanism.content: React-integrated upload system with resumable capability for files >1TB
upload_mechanism.large_file_support: Seamless handling of files >1TB with background processing
upload_mechanism.progress_tracking: Real-time upload progress in React UI

processing_pipeline.content: Multi-stage file processing pipeline with integrity verification and content analysis
processing_order: 5. Video sample creation (first 30 seconds, low quality)

failure_handling.virus_scan_failure: Retry once, then delete file and warn user. Archivists can override with risk warning
failure_handling.integrity_failure: Mark file for replacement, notify administrators

processing_pipeline.status_tracking: Users see processing status in React UI
processing_pipeline.background_processing: All post-upload processing via Celery tasks

validation_system.content: Comprehensive file validation during ingestion with metadata storage
validation_system.metadata_storage: Validation results stored as File model fields
validation_system.existing_fields: Some validation metadata fields already exist in current model

download_capabilities.content: Multiple download methods supporting large files and API integration
download_capabilities.streaming_download: Django StreamingHttpResponse for large file downloads
download_capabilities.signed_urls: Expiring download links for API consumers
download_capabilities.api_integration: Download links provided through both internal and public APIs
download_capabilities.large_file_optimization: Efficient streaming without loading entire files into memory

public_server_handling.content: File metadata sync to public server even when actual files are restricted
public_server_handling.sync_logic: Configurable access level filtering for file sync (default: level 1 only)
public_server_handling.admin_ui: Private server UI allows archivists/admins to configure which access levels sync
public_server_handling.metadata_sync: File metadata (size, checksum, format) syncs even when actual file doesn't

missing_file_ux.ui: Disabled download buttons with 'Contact archive for access' message
missing_file_ux.api: download_available: false, download_url: null, access_message provided

checksum_system.content: SHA-256 checksums for both integrity verification and public sharing
checksum_system.calculation_timing: Streaming calculation during upload (no full file in memory required)
checksum_system.dual_purpose: Same checksum serves integrity verification and public user verification
checksum_system.storage: Checksum stored in File model for API access
checksum_system.public_access: Checksums available through public API for user verification

integrity_monitoring.content: Periodic integrity checks with administrative monitoring and file replacement system
integrity_monitoring.periodic_checks: Seldom Celery task verifies file integrity against stored checksums
integrity_monitoring.status_tracking: File integrity status stored as private metadata (archivists/admins only)
integrity_monitoring.admin_interface: UI page for archivists/admins to view integrity issues and take action
integrity_monitoring.replacement_system: Special upload feature for replacing corrupted files without full processing pipeline
integrity_monitoring.replacement_process: Verify correct checksum, replace file, resolve failure status

migration_approach.content: One-time manual migration from Document to File model with comprehensive verification
migration_approach.timing: Manual execution when Stage 2 development is complete and ready for production
migration_approach.migration_process: Custom migration scripts with data integrity verification
migration_approach.rollback_plan: Document model kept as backup until migration verified successful
migration_approach.verification_checks: Built-in verification to ensure all Document data successfully migrated
migration_approach.model_retirement: Document model retired only after successful migration verification

api_exposure.content: File model exposed through both internal and public APIs with appropriate filtering
api_exposure.public_api: Read-only access through /api/v1/ endpoints with access level filtering
api_exposure.serializer_strategy: Separate serializers for internal vs public use cases
api_exposure.download_integration: Download URLs provided through API responses
api_exposure.metadata_sharing: File metadata available even when actual files are restricted

search_adaptation.content: Existing search functionality adapted for File model when migration complete
search_adaptation.timing: Search functionality updated during migration process
search_adaptation.search_fields: File metadata integrated into existing search capabilities
search_adaptation.relationship_search: File-Item relationships maintained in search results

milestone_1.title: File Model and Storage Infrastructure
deliverables: Enhanced File model with all required fields

milestone_4.title: Integrity and Public Server Integration
deliverables: File replacement system for corrupted files
Public server sync with access level filtering

stage_completion.content: Stage 2 complete when full repository management system operational with successful Document→File migration
functional_requirements: Seamless file ingestion for files of any size including >1TB
Complete processing pipeline with integrity verification
Public server file sync with access level control
Administrative tools for integrity monitoring and file management
All Document model data successfully migrated to File model
API integration for both internal and public access
stage_completion.performance_requirements: System handles expected file volumes and sizes without performance degradation
stage_completion.data_integrity: 100% successful migration with verification checks passed
stage_completion.user_acceptance: Museum staff can efficiently manage file ingestion and access
